author: awuraadwoa
title: Educating head porters in vocations
description: Girl child labour is an issue in Ghana, where young females especially from the north are used to carry goods from one location to another.
solution: To bring young females who are into head-porterage together to learn vocational skills which will help them improve on their ways of living.
experience: Basic data base entries, 2 years of training the youth in development and for the betterment of the country and world as a whole.
